meanings.definition: To whip or beat with a rawhide.
meanings.sent1: The cowboy rawhided the horse to make it move faster.
meanings.sent2: She rawhided the rug to clean off the dust.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy rawhided the curtains, thinking they were a toy.
meanings.sent4: The storm rawhided the trees with its fierce winds.
meanings.sent5: The teacher rawhided the chalkboard to get the students' attention.

meanings.definition: A whip or beating instrument made of rawhide.
meanings.sent1: The rancher's rawhided was well-crafted and sturdy.
meanings.sent2: He used the rawhided to guide the cattle in the right direction.
meanings.sent3: The old cowboy proudly displayed his rawhided on the wall.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the rawhided cracking echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: She held the rawhided firmly, ready to use it if needed.
